column5: I know there was a section for this on the web site before if theres a over site hopefully a admin will move this thread, Any one out there need a partner for opener this weekend i will help out with costs, send me a PM.. Cheers..
uhhh... opener was on the 26th.. this past weekend.. lol
Patrick, you're a few days late bud
Not sure which area you're fishing but bass opened this past saturday in zone 17.
Opps! my bad, Its been over a year since i last fished  well anyone looking for a partner for this long weekend?? Thanks for the heads up Alex.
LOL, its not a long weekend either. I think for majority of the workforce, we get Thursday off, and Friday is a regular work day.  Good luck fishing this weekend!
lol my buds have "dr's appointments" and will be "ill" on friday so were headed up to rice on thursday 5pm.
